paper_abstract: Fifty years have passed since the assassination of U.S. President Kennedy. Despite the long passage of time, it is still argued that the famous backyard photo of Oswald, holding the same type of rifle used to assassinate the President, is a fake. These claims include, among others, that Oswald's pose in the photo is physically implausible. We describe a detailed 3-D stability analysis to determine if this claim is warranted.
paper_title: A 3-D STABILITY ANALYSIS OF LEE HARVEY OSWALD IN THE BACKYARD PHOTO
